title: pls i need some tips on how to face garen
body: im sick of losing my lane everytime i play against this bs does someone know how i can against  this monstrosity of a top laner {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
Since the other 2 comments are just "play x" ill try to give some real tips

1. Try to poke him to stop his passive

2. Have jg gank after he uses his q, so he has no escape

3. Armor pen or magic pen, he generally builds full tank, sometimes without black cleaver

4. Stop him from stacking his w, and only fight when it is down

You need to post some info. Who are you playing vs him? So people know what to tell you. Ex: how to play out the matchup, recommended items and in what order, runes, masteries, etc. Ex: many renekton players actually start w (stun) vs him instead of q which is their normal start in most matchups. This is because while you get silenced by garen, you activate w before he hits you with q. This stuns him - allowing you to continue autoing him while he does nothing because he is stunned. Thus you win lvl 1 trades vs garen as renekton. That's one example. So if you really do want help, say what your matchup is or ask what to play vs garen and people can recommend matchups and describe what to do. Also is garen always running the same masteries or does it vary by match? Ex: grasp, fervor, thunderlords, etc.

In my opinion of garen players they normally target the weaker of champs so they can get fed. my recommendation since I'm a support main I normally am with the team but having JG gank is a good first choice if you don't wanna rely on the jungler go with a item or two of armor pen or magic pen depending on who you are playing as followed up by tank items, or final option is to get him under turret and keep him there if to many minions best is to have jg gank
